What high satisfaction was thus lost to this youth's soul ! For to have striven as he had done was indeed glorious ; and his imagination, under the impulse and guidance of nobler principles and feelings, might have visited in its dreams the braes of Holylee as the only paradise on earth, and his father's lowdy mansion at Ladysidc as the very centre of that paradise, from which would have streamed a light that need never to have been darkened before the eyes of filial reverence.
